Posts.Content: pnkrbn02 wrote: hello! i am a 5yr+ bc survivor myself, and i currently have a friend going fighting it. my experience has been very different from hers. she was given chemo treatments, 3 weeks apart, for 6 treatments. they told her they wanted to perform her mastectomy NOT before 3 weeks after the last chemo treatment and NOT after 6 weeks after the last treatment, so basically, between weeks 3-6. then they called to reschedule her surgery and it's now at week 10 post chemo. she's concerned and wants to push the issue but she feels she's been getting the run around etc, esp since she is uninsured. does anyone have any insight, suggestions, etc. thanks so much in advance!
